message:
Update MCI Datasets URL (#2568)

The URL for the MCI Datasets no longer includes the `.php` extension.
Visiting the URL with the `.php` intact will result in a `404`.

Fixed some typos and wordings in a few files in the appendix section (#2558)

* fix some minor typos and wordings in statistics.md

* minor typo in single-variable-calculus.md

* minor capitalization fix
TF: default tensors creation statement fixed (#2548)
Update installation and config for 1.0 (d2l==1.0, d2l-en-1.0.zip)
Add mathit for math in fig captions

freeze d2l lib for v1.0.0 release (#2545)

* d2l library 1.0.0 release freeze

* CI: disable caching for scratch tests

* Use numpy==1.24.4 for py3.8 support

* Use numpy==1.23.5

* PyTorch: Fix numpy object to float conversion

* MXNet: Fix mxnet arange issue

* CI: enable caching switchback
Fix wrong indent of the final bib entry
Fix bib & separate appendix math into two lines in title
